channel.title: CVE Feed for ServiceNow -- Now User Experience
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ServiceNow -- Now User Experience

item.title: CVE-2023-1298|2024-08-02T05:40:59.973Z -- servicenow -- now%20user%20experience
item.description: ServiceNow has released upgrades and patches that address a Reflected Cross-Site scripting (XSS) vulnerability that was identified in the ServiceNow Polaris Layout. This vulnerability would enable an authenticated user to inject arbitrary scripts.
